dcterms:description: A large and clean multilingual corpus of sentence-aligned spoken utterances extracted from the Bible, containing 8,130 sentences across eight languages.
dcterms:title: MaSS multilingual speech corpus

dcterms:creator: M. Z. Boito
W. N. Havard
M. Garnerin
É. L. Ferrand
L. Besacier
dcterms:description: The Bible used as the source material for creating the MaSS dataset, providing multilingual speech and text alignment.
dcterms:title: Bible (used in MaSS dataset)

dcterms:creator: M. Z. Boito
W. N. Havard
M. Garnerin
É. L. Ferrand
L. Besacier
dcterms:description: A dataset used for monolingual segmentation, which is part of the MaSS dataset's processing pipeline.
dcterms:title: dpseg (used for monolingual segmentation)
